ModMetaData.name: Rimhammer - Story Tellers
ModMetaData.author: SickBoyWi
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds Warhammer themed story tellers from the Warhammer - The End Times lore period.
This mod is intended to accompany the Rimhammer - The End Times mod series, but none of those mods are required to use this one.
Story Tellers added:
Karl Franz: Karl Franz creates story events on an increasing curve of challenge, progression, and tension. Born in a world where he had to struggle, he'll challenge you with tests of skill and character, believing a steadfast approach will lead to a better story through hardships.
More to come in the future.
Note: If you're using mods that add custom events, they may not occur with a custom story teller. I can patch them in, if you let me know.
